name: New Zealand Research Information System (NZRIS) Data Specifications Organisation Project Role
maintainer: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Definition: The organisation administering allocation of resources
The organisation providing research office services for the project
Lead organisation identified in project documentation
Organisation participating in research and innovation, receiving funding and/or resourcing from the lead organisation
Organisation or entity contracted to provide a particular service to lead or sub-recipient, but not an active participant in the research and innovation project
An organisation involved in the project which may also benefit from project outputs.
Organisation providing a work environment (physical and/or virtual) for part or all of the project
The organisation with responsibility for administration of the project
